original_text: So Satan would not attack himself. If he did that, he would destroy his own power. That would be the end of him.
korean_text: 만일 사탄이 자기를 거슬러 일어나 분쟁하면 설 수 없고 망하느니라

sentences.original_text: So Satan would not attack himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사탄은 자신을 공격하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: he would destroy his own power
That would be the end of him
